member.name: IInputObjectSite.OnFocusChangeIS
member.summary: Informs the browser that the focus has changed.
member.param: The address of the interface of the object gaining or losing the focus.
Indicates if the object has gained or lost the focus. If this value is nonzero, the object has gained the focus. If this value is zero, the object has lost the focus.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the method was successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise.

member.name: IInputObjectSite
member.summary: Exposes a method that is used to communicate focus changes for a user input object contained in the Shell.
